mapper.sql: id, update_time AS updateTime, create_time AS createTime, ordersn, file_name AS fileName,file_addr AS fileAddr, file_size AS fileSize, file_hash AS fileHash, file_sign AS fileSign,bucket_name AS bucketName, encrypted, encrypt_alog AS encryptAlog, encrypt_key AS encryptKey
mapper.select:
select
FROM attest_file af WHERE af.ordersn = #{ordersn} limit 1
